wikipedia_page.main: Dennis Kennedy is a writer on Irish and European affairs. His most recent publications include Square Peg; The Life and Times of a Northern Newspaperman South of the Border, Nonsuch, November 2009, and Climbing Slemish: An Ulster Memoir.

response: * Dennis Campbell Kennedy (born 1930), writer on Irish and European affairs
